Submit.definition: to yield or subject to control or authority [to himself to the jurisdiction of the tribal court " Sheppard v. Sheppard
Submit.origin: [to himself to the jurisdiction of the tribal court " Sheppard v. Sheppard , 655 P.2d 895 (1982)"]

1.definition: to yield oneself [parties to a contract may agree in advance to to the jurisdiction of a given court ", 375 U.S. 311 (1964)"]

2 a.definition: to present or propose to another for review, consideration, or decisionto commit to a trier of fact or law for decision after the close of trial or argument [the trial court could properly both counts to the jury "Rorie Sherman"]

3.definition: to put forward as an opinion or contention

2.definition: to defer to or consent to abide by the opinion of another
